**Project duration:** 2022-2025  
**Funding:** National Science Centre of Poland (NCN) No. 2021/03/Y/ST10/00093 BiodivRestore  
**Role:** Project contractor, member of the consortium

This project focuses on restoring peatlands of the nemoral zone under conditions of varying water supply and quality. The research aims to understand the ecological and hydrological processes that drive peatland restoration and resilience, with a focus on greenhouse gas balances and ecosystem responses to environmental change.
